MineralSite.name: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Penasco Quemado Project in North America dated March 2006.pdf

document.title: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Penasco Quemado Project in North America dated March 2006.pdf
document.description: This report provides an updated technical review and resource estimate for the Peñasco Quemado silver property situated in the Magdalena-Tubutama Mining District of Sonora, Mexico. It includes the results of the 2006 drilling program and the proposed work plan for further exploration.
